issue.title: [CF 537] Stance option for warlocks
issue.body:
Is there any way to add stance conditionals for warlocks too (no stance, Metamorphosis and Dark Apotheosis)?


> Posted by CurseForge user V0rphy | Imported from CurseForge issue #537 | Raw

comments.body:
The existing stance condition should work with metamorphosis. I didn't even know Dark Apotheosis was a thing that existed. I will add it in soon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
